Job Description:
4 to 6 years of hands- on programming experience with Java /  CoreJava,  Spring MVC and Struts framework. 

Working with RESTful Web Services and API development using drop wizard. 

Experience with one or more of the following databases: SQL Server,  MySQL,  PostgreSQL,  Oracle,  Couchbase,  Cassandra or other NoSQL technologies. 

Experience of working with open source technologies such as RabbitMQ,  Elasticsearch will be plus. 

Experience /  knowledge into JavaScript + Angular /  React Js is preferred. 

B.Tech /  M.Tech in Computer Science OR related technical discipline. Responsibilities: 

Create beautiful,  interactive and easy- to- use web applications using a rich client- side code and MVC based server- side code. 

Learn the nuts and bolts of Service- Oriented Architecture (SOA) and Event- Driven Architecture (EDA) in real- life applications. 

Gain experience with different database technologies,  ranging from traditional relational to the latest NoSQL products such as Couchbase. 

Work on Internet- scale applications,  where performance,  reliability,  and scalability,  are critical design goals not after- thoughts. 

Other Details 

Industry: IT- Software/ Software Services 

Employement Type: PERMANENT
